feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v3.9.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • docs: Update README.md add minimum PostgreSQL version by @uxfed in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14432
  • docs: Update README.md regarding POSTGRES db port by @yaminikosaraju in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14431
  • fix: Return team event type by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14464
  • fix: Allow unpublished org to serve redirected links plus other org onboarding fixes by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14337
  • chore: Release SDK 1.0.0 by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14462
  • chore: typo by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14472

New Contributors

  • @uxfed made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14432
  • @yaminikosaraju made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14431

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v3.9.6...v3.9.7

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v3.9.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: Ensure the session is invalidated during booking-seats test by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14478
  • chore: add instruction in recording email by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14424
  • refactor: Add crm type to app credentials by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14147
  • fix: Remove exports in barrel file which are causing prisma import on client side by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14475
  • fix: isTeamEvent would eval to null when undefined by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14480
  • fix: Remove logo from getPublicEvent response by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14488
  • feat: ooo-v2 by @alannnc in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13621
  • refactor: v2 docs by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14446
  • fix: unnecessary access token guard on public endpoint for slots by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14492
  • fix: [CAL-422] Intercom App add link by @vachmara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14496
  • fix: view team bookings by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14079
  • chore: AtomsWrapper to scope css by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14490
  • feat: new App install flow by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/11975
  • fix: org-redirect-url-admin-update by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14493
  • fix: private link for a team event gives 404 by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14473
  • feat: SDK managed users + PLA fixes by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14495
  • fix: Fix broken locale in Availability Settings title by @emeeran in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14501
  • chore: bump atoms to 1.0.13 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14506
  • fix: OOO for team events by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14503
  • fix(platform): missing string literal opening by @johnforte in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14463
  • feat: Implement the ability to login via multiple means when signed up via google/non-cal providers by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14082
  • fix: correct language is used when booking with a modal + location icon visible in booker when using light mode by @Jojo14234 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14280
  • feat: In Embed, Fire 'routed' event when Routing Form routes by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14470
  • fix: platform booking endpoints should be public by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14509
  • fix: platform gcal connect reconnect credentials by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14513
  • fix: Broken SSR for event booking pages by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14497
  • fix: test by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14535
  • feat: add redirect uris for booking success, cancel and reschedule for a platform user by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14518
  • fix: Redirect only those apps that extend 'EventType' to the new apps install flow by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14527
  • feat: always show intercom on desktop by default (hidden on mobile) by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14423
  • revert: "fix: Redirect only those apps that extend 'EventType' to the new apps install flow" by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14539
  • fix: Invalid 403 forbidden for event-types GET by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14528
  • revert: "feat: new App install flow" by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14540

New Contributors

  • @emeeran made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14501
  • @johnforte made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14463
  • @Jojo14234 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14280

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v3.9.7...v3.9.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v3.9.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: State Inconsistency issue on webhook edit modal by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14544
  • chore: Publish new versions of embeds by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14543
  • fix: atoms package types were not exported by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14546
  • fix: Remove hardcoded stripe.. by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14549
  • chore: Bump SDK version 1.0.1 by @exception in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14524
  • fix: [CAL-3374] Says Number is not Verified, but it is Verified by @Chiranjeev-droid in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14531
  • fix: v2 create schedule with availabilities by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14551
  • feat: Delete/Create WebhookScheduledTriggers for existing bookings by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14121
  • feat: travel schedules to schedule timezone changes by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14512
  • chore: enable platform emails by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14471
  • fix: Cal Video Links Expire After 14 Days by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14557
  • fix: update playwright config to allow permissions by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14526
  • feat: add classNames prop to Booker atom for passing external styles by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14270
  • fix: remove prefix /api from apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14559
  • chore: adds maintenance mode for API v1 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14555
  • revert: "fix: view team bookings (#14079)" by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14561
  • chore: fix class type and bump atoms version by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14562
  • refactor: v2 event types endpoint paths by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14545
  • feat: return isPlatform boolean to detect if user is a platform user by @Ryukemeister in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14570
  • fix: Integrate maintenance mode with current middleware by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14571

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v3.9.8...v3.9.9

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.0.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: remove /ee from apiv2 urls by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14568
  • fix: only call useMe if access token is set by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14576
  • fix: Production deploys by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14578
  • fix: Remove PageWrapper by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14579

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v3.9.9...v4.0.0

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.0.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: removing stripe results in the event-types page loading indefintely by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14583
  • fix: conditionally remove fixed prop if we're in embed by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14586
  • fix: acme.cal.local crashes due to missing requestedSlug in seed by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14592
  • fix: email not sending with : in from name by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14594
  • fix: intercom visible on mobile by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14563
  • fix: Re-instate hasEmailBeenChanged before sending email by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14596
  • feat: use experimental optimizePackageImports for @calcom/ui by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14587
  • chore: org signup for admins min 1 org user, for self-serve 30 by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14567
  • feat: update platform oauth client form by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14542
  • chore: Delete duplicate apps/platform directory by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14520
  • fix: update sub-team slug - update tempOrgRedirect by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14523
  • fix: hide "upgrade org banner" for isPlatform by @PeerRich in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14522
  • fix: Remove // @ts-ignore by @kaleem68 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14582
  • chore: bump atoms to v1.0.22 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14585
  • fix: custom attributes not being synced in intercom by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14600
  • refactor: remove /ee/ url segment from atoms hooks by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14602
  • feat: round robin: show avatar and name of person on success page by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14245
  • fix: always load troubleshooter without SSR by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14476
  • chore: Adds deprecated-imports-next-router by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14486
  • fix: change max width to avoid overflow in dialog when creating new event type by @xylonx in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14198
  • fix: Organization payment failure in case of custom price by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14574
  • fix: rescheduling daily by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/13736
  • fix: booker atoms using next/router by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14612
  • fix: Minimum fix for N Calendar Invites by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14617
  • chore: v4.0.1 by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14618

New Contributors

  • @kaleem68 made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14582
  • @xylonx made their first contribution in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/14198

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.0.0...v4.0.1
